fields.name: Drive-By Effect:
fields.value: - Pay $100 and permanently increase the cost by $100.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The first time this would bankrupt someone, they will stay in the game and become immune to losing money for 5 rounds.
- After thet effect, this tile then gets replaced with a random property of any set, ignoring Typical property count rules, and the affected player gains ownership of it.
